content: ssk k to end of round 2 stitches decreased round 2 work in pattern repeat these 2 rounds until you are back to your original number of stitches 56 60 64 68 72 you may have one more or fewer decrease on the left or right side of the foot depending on how you picked up the heel flap stitches and that s okay © veronica parsons 2018 page 3 of 4 for fingering weight abbreviations yarn k knit miss babs hot shot 80% superwash merino k2tog knit 2 stitches together 1 stitch wool 20% nylon 400 yd/4 oz 365m/115g decreased skeins m1 make one stitch by picking up the bar between the 2 stitches below from front to back and knitting it through the back loop 1 skein shown in fired up p purl p2tog purl 2 stitches together 1 stitch or approximately 350-400 yards fingering weight decreased yarn ssk slip 2 stitches one at a time as if to knit insert left needle into the front of these two needles stitches and knit them together from this us 1 2 25 mm double pointed position 1 stitch decreased or size to obtain gauge for sport weight yarn gauge table miss babs yummy 3-ply 100% superwash merino check your gauge and stitch count wool 335 yd/5 3 oz 306m / 150g skeins combination below to determine the finished circumference of your sock 1 skein leg and foot or approximately 280-335 yards sport weight stitches → 56 60 64 68 72 yarn gauge ↓ 7 sts/inch 8 8½ 9¼ 9¾ needles us 2 2 75 mm double pointed 7 5 7½ 8 8½ 9 9½ or size to obtain gauge 8 7 7½ 8 8½ 9 notions tapestry needle 8 5 6½ 7 7½ 8 8½ 9 6½ 7 7½ 8 gauge and finished size see table at right © veronica parsons 2018 page 4 of 4
